mapper.select: select a.bno as bno, a.id as id, a.gno as gno, a.gcolor as gcolor, a.amount as amount, a.gsize as gsize, a.bdate as bdate, b.gcategory as gcategory, b.gname as gname, b.gprice as gprice, b.gcontent as gcontent, b.gimage as gimage, b.best as best from basket a inner join goods b on a.gno=b.gno where a.bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update basket set gcolor=#{gcolor}, amount=#{amount}, gsize=#{gsize}, bdate=now() where bno=#{bno}
